title: Robert F. Kennedy Jr. faces critical vote by Senate committee
shortDescription: The Senate Finance Committee will vote Tuesday whether to reject Robert F. Kennedy's nomination as HHS secretary or send it to the full Senate.

title: China hits back with levies on US goods after Trump's tariffs take effect
shortDescription: China's finance ministry said it would impose levies of 15% for U.S. coal and 10% for crude oil, farm equipment and some cars.

title: Trump orders creation of sovereign wealth fund
shortDescription: President Donald Trump signed an executive order to create the nation's first sovereign wealth fund, which could be used to purchase TikTok.

title: White House mulling future of Education Department
shortDescription: The president has vowed to close the longstanding federal agency, though he would need Congress to do that.

title: Senate confirms Trump pick for Energy secretary Chris Wright
shortDescription: The Senate confirmed oil industry exec Chris Wright to lead the Department of Energy, after the Trump nominee testified that climate change is real.

title: 'A coup': Democrats react to Musk's DOGE takeover at Treasury
shortDescription: The dramatic power play began Friday, continued through the weekend -- and poses extraordinary and unprecedented threats to US security, lawmakers say

title: Joe Biden signs with talent agency 2 weeks after leaving White House
shortDescription: The Los Angeles-based Creative Artists Agency announced on Monday that it's representing Biden. The agency also represents Barack and Michelle Obama.

title: Trump: US tariffs on Canada paused for at least 30 days
shortDescription: The Canadian prime minister said the country has a $1.3 billion border plan and 10,000 "frontline personnel" protecting the border.

title: Could Trump's creation of sovereign wealth fund be used to buy TikTok?
shortDescription: Trump issued an executive order for the creation of the nation's first sovereign wealth fund, which could be used to purchase TikTok.

title: This Bob Woodward post about Trump isn't real | Fact check
shortDescription: There is no record of the supposed post on Bob Woodward's X profile. The image originated as satire.

title: Kentucky Rep. re-introduces bill to abolish Department of Education
shortDescription: On Friday, Republican Rep. Thomas Massie of Kentucky re-introduced a bill that seeks to abolish the Department of Education.

title: Judge says Trump administration appears to still be freezing funding
shortDescription: A small nonprofit, which helps West Virginians with disabilities, found its federal government reimbursements funds were unavailable as of Sunday.

title: London protest video predates 2025 Trump inauguration | Fact check
shortDescription: The video was captured in London in 2018, more than six years before Trump's second term.

title: Trump to hit Canada, Mexico and China with tariffs beginning Saturday
shortDescription: Plus: A Medevac jet crashed into a residential Philadelphia neighborhood Friday evening, with six people on board. The black box has been recovered.

title: An office, but no paycheck: Trump makes Elon Musk a government employee
shortDescription: President Trump made Elon Musk, head of the Department of Government Efficiency, a 'special government employee' at the White House. Here's what that means.

title: Federal makeover: What Trump has done to remake the US government
shortDescription: From buyout offers to federal workers to ending diversity programs, a look at what Trump has done to remake the US government since Jan. 20.

title: Trump to talk tariffs with leaders of Canada and Mexico | The Excerpt
shortDescription: Plus: Authorities say the Black Hawk that collided with a passenger jet may have been flying higher than the max altitude for its training mission.

title: What is USAID? Explaining the agency Musk, Trump aim to shutter
shortDescription: Elon Musk said he is feeding USAID thorugh the wood chipper. The federal agency provides disaster relief across the world and promotes democracy.

title: Fox to air Trump pre-taped interview during Super Bowl pregame show
shortDescription: Fox's political anchor Bret Baier speaks with President Trump in a pre-taped interview to air during Super Bowl pregame show. Here's what to know.

title: Trump to use obscure 18th century wartime law in mass deportations
shortDescription: Donald Trump wants to deport immigrants alleged to be gang members without court hearing using the Alien Enemies Act.

title: Musk says he and Trump are putting USAID 'into the wood chipper'
shortDescription: Tech billionaire Elon Musk said he is feeding the Washington foreign aid agency "into the wood chipper" as part of an effort to slash federal spending.
